answers.answer: You sound diabetic or pre-diabetic.  You need to talk to your doctor about diabetes screening and risk factors.  And, you need to lose a lot of weight, soon.

question: I have this dark ring around my neck/under arm pits and other spotsi am 17 and weight 256.i went my doctor he gaved me a cream called fluocinonide 0.05% and when i use it my neck is like completely clean.when i stop using it.it comes back wtfhow?
title: Dark Ring Around The neck
